attributes.action: create a Beadle statue outside WHSmiths in Southend High Street
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As proved by the recent Facebook group the aforementioned man (Beadle) is an absolute legend. Therefore the people of Southend and its outer boroughs will not rest until he has been fully recognised with the construction of a 50ft statue made entirely of carrier bags.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
